contributors.description: An array of objects of contributors and contributions to the data or metadata.

title.description: A full name of the contributor.
title.title: Contributor Title

path.description: A qualified link or path pointing to a relevant location online for the contributor. This can be the GitHub page or ORCID.
path.title: Path

organization.description: A string describing the organization this contributor is affiliated to. This can be relevant for the copyright.
organization.title: Organization

roles.description: An array describing the roles of the contributor.

items.description: A role is recommended to follow an established vocabulary, such as DataCite Metadata Schema’s contributorRole or CreDIT. Useful roles to indicate are: creator, contact, and dataCurator.
items.title: Role

roles.title: Roles

date.description: The date of the final contribution. Date Format is ISO 8601.
date.title: Date

object.description: The object of the contribution. Which part of the package was supplied or changed.
object.title: Object

comment.description: A free-text commentary on what has been done.
comment.title: Comment

contributors.title: Contributors
